jp_text: たった二人の 歓びを探せたなら
google_translated: If you were searching for two people

en_text: Even if cold flames should sear my body
jp_text: どんな冷たい焔に身を焼かれても
google_translated: Even if you are baked on any cold

en_text: I want to return this world to the clear water
jp_text: この世界を 澄んだ水の中へ還したい
google_translated: I want to return this world into clear water

en_text: Sadness alone will not disappear
jp_text: 哀しみだけ消せはしない
google_translated: Do not delete only hate

en_text: Simply and quietly shines towards the beginning and rots away
jp_text: ただ静かに 始まりへ朽ちて行くよ
google_translated: I'm going to decay quietly to the beginning

en_text: The longing that has been sealed is still far away
jp_text: 閉ざされた憧れは まだ遠くへ
google_translated: Longing longing is still far
